name: Pet Shop Stop [ALPHA]
description:
NOTE: I have no idea why the game is 144 MB, it's not that long (5-10 min max). My Minecraft world is 101 MB and contains more content than the game.

Woo, Gogratulates!!! Killene Yuii ( YOU, the protag ) just scored a little internship job at a Pet Store in the infamous Haylillyillya forest! Now you get to experience the fun too! There are many fun tasks in the pet shop to be done (two) and many characters to interact with! (two again) Who wouldn't want to have a job like that?

The locals are nice, the weather is nice, the scenery makes for amazing photographs, and best of all; no one knows anything about the mysterious forest, and its origins are debatable.

This little visual novel game was made during the 2021 MS Paint Jam but I severely underestimated the size of my finished game so it's way longer than it should be causing the Jam to end before I can finish my game this is so sad

It "functions"  Goldfish Feeding "Mini-Game Promotional image, a "screenshot" of my video-game
